mapper.update: update in_out_storages set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, good_id = #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_number = #{terminalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, types = #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_user_id = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cs_out_storage_id = #{csOutStorageId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_id, order_type, good_id, quantity, terminal_number, types, created_user_id, created_at, cs_out_storage_id from in_out_storages where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
